name: Diagram: Hamayumi
desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hamayumi.

customize.name: Takashi
customize.desc: A man who lives inside a conch hut. He allows travelers to exchange three Mysterious Conches to open one of the three Common Chests in his house.

customize.text: 's 7th Common Chest in <color=#ece5d8>Tatarasuna</color> to obtain the Forging Blueprint.

customize.name: Hamayumi
customize.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Northlander Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.name: Amethyst Lump
customize.desc: An uncut crystal that can only be found in Inazuma. Some professional craftsmanship will bring out its true value.

customize.name: White Iron Chunk
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

customize.name: Saimon Heirloom Blade Diagram
customize.desc: The Saimon Clan possessed this diagram of how to make the Amenoma Kageuchi (Sword). You can use it to master art of making this weapon.

customize.name: Diagram: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
customize.desc: Someone from Tatarasuna left this diagram of Katsuragikiri Nagamasa behind. You can use it to master the art of making this Claymore.

customize.name: Diagram: Kitain Cross Spear
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Kitain Cross Spear (Polearm).

customize.name: Mask of Memories
customize.desc:
Kazari the shrine maiden used to wear this mask. It is deeply stained on the inside.
Some memories are contained inside, through which one may learn the art of creating the Catalyst known as "Hakushin Ring."
Now that Kazari has been separated from this mask, Paimon doesn't get to call her the "Masked Maiden" anymore, right?

value.text: Obtained from opening Takashi's 7th Common Chest in Tatarasuna

value.name: Hamayumi
value.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
